member.name: F:TradingBot.Communications.AzureTablePricesPublisher.MaxQueueCount
member.summary: One AzureTable field must be 64k or less. Strings are stored in UTF16 encoding, so maximum number of characters is 32K. One serialized entry has size no more then 100 characters.

member.summary: A flag indicating if the candlestick is complete. A complete candlestick is one whose ending time is not in the future.

member.name: T:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price
member.summary: The specification of an Account-specific Price. http://developer.oanda.com/rest-live-v20/pricing-df/#Price

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.Instrument
member.summary: The Price’s Instrument.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.Time
member.summary: The date/time when the Price was created

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.Tradeable
member.summary: Flag indicating if the Price is tradeable or not

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.Bids
member.summary: The list of prices and liquidity available on the Instrument’s bid side. It is possible for this list to be empty if there is no bid liquidity currently available for the Instrument in the Account.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.Asks
member.summary: The list of prices and liquidity available on the Instrument’s ask side. It is possible for this list to be empty if there is no ask liquidity currently available for the Instrument in the Account.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.CloseoutBid
member.summary: The closeout bid Price. This Price is used when a bid is required to closeout a Position (margin closeout or manual) yet there is no bid liquidity. The closeout bid is never used to open a new position.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.Price.CloseoutAsk
member.summary: The closeout ask Price. This Price is used when a ask is required to closeout a Position (margin closeout or manual) yet there is no ask liquidity. The closeout ask is never used to open a new position.

member.name: T:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.PriceBucket
member.summary: A Price Bucket represents a price available for an amount of liquidity.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.PriceBucket.Price
member.summary: The Price offered by the PriceBucket.

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.PriceBucket.Liquidity
member.summary: The amount of liquidity offered by the PriceBucket.

member.name: T:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.PriceHeartbeat
member.summary: A PricingHeartbeat object is injected into the Pricing stream to ensure that the HTTP connection remains active. http://developer.oanda.com/rest-live-v20/pricing-df/#PricingHeartbeat

member.name: P:TradingBot.Exchanges.Concrete.Oanda.Entities.Prices.PriceHeartbeat.Time
member.summary: The date/time when the Heartbeat was created.
